news.markdown:
**Brighton People's Theatre**
We are delighted that we will be choreographers for the very exciting new project of [Brighton People's Theatre](https://brightonpeoplestheatre.org/austerity-and-the-city/). _Tighten Our Belts_ is a show about the cost of Austerity for the people of Brighton and Hove. Brighton Dome on 26 Nov. 

** Reviews for _MAY-WE-GO-ROUND?_ at Edinburgh Fringe 2016 **
 [Fest magazine](https://www.festmag.co.uk/theatre/103215-maywegoround) --- "exquisitely clever, technically stellar ... euphoric, and so infectious" 
[The Skinny](http://www.theskinny.co.uk/festivals/edinburgh-fringe/theatre/dance-base-round-up-edinburgh-fringe-2016)  --- "Hilarious and witty: a joy"  
[Total Theatre Magazine](http://totaltheatre.org.uk/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/) --- "Laugh out loud ... a mixture of charisma and sheer will" 
 [EdinburghGuide.com](http://www.edinburghguide.com/festival/2016/edinburghfringe/maywegorounddancebasereview-17119) --- "Touching, endearing and funny"   
 [Ian Abbott](http://writingaboutdance.com/performance/ian-abbott-edinburgh-fringe-hiccup-project/) --- "Choreographic candyfloss" 
[Across the Arts](http://www.acrossthearts.co.uk/news/artsblog/festival-review-dance-base-2016/) --- "The real star of the piece is the friendship the two performers share." 

**5* REVIEW** for _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ at [FringeGuru](http://brighton.fringeguru.com/reviews/brighton-2016/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it).

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn Tour 2016**
**14 October** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University ---** [Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/online/article/maywegoround)**
**11 November** --- Pegasus Theatre, Oxford --- **[Tickets](http://pegasustheatre.org.uk/?post_type=shows&p=9905)**
**22 November** --- Exeter Phoenix --- **[Tickets](https://www.exeterphoenix.org.uk/events/may-we-go-round/)**
**25 November** --- Barbican Theatre, Plymouth --- **[Tickets](https://www.barbicantheatre.co.uk/event-details/?eid=34426)**
**7 December** --- Mumford Theatre, Anglia Ruskin University --- **[Tickets](http://www.anglia.ac.uk/arts-law-and-social-sciences/mumford-theatre/may-we-go-round)**
